GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/businesses.description: serves up an array of objects of all available businesses

GET /api/businesses/:_id.description: serves up a business's details by their name

GET /api/customers.description: serves up an array of objects of all available customers

GET /api/customers/:_id.description: serves up a business's details by their name
